function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High exposure risks in construction activities","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and spread","Mitigation":"Implementing engineering controls, administrative controls, safe work practices, and PPE guidelines","Technologies":"Engineering controls, administrative controls, PPE","People":"Construction workers, supervisors, managers, and laborers","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers"},{"Description":"Development of plans to deal with COVID-19 in construction jobsites","Impact":"Potential gaps in effectiveness and coordination of COVID-19 mitigation measures","Mitigation":"Regular review and update of plans based on evolving guidelines and best practices","Technologies":"N/A","People":"City officials, construction project managers","Owner":"City administrations, construction companies"},{"Description":"Growth of construction sector in Boston","Impact":"Increased potential for COVID-19 transmission within a growing workforce","Mitigation":"Ensuring strict adherence to COVID-19 mitigation measures and guidelines","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Construction workers, supervisors, managers","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers"}]}
